attributes.action: This country needs a referendum now!
attributes.additional_details:
s country needs a referendum now!
If David Cameron has his way we will never have an honest  unbiased one! The EU are forcing his hand and he is bowing down before them like a lap dog.
The EU will bring about the downfall of Great Britain, we as a proud country need to show these bullies within the EU that we will not be told what to do and we decide our own fate!!
My grandfather and many others who I am very proud of fought to give us our freedom and freedom of speech, so why now is our own government selling us down the river??
SIGN THIS PETITION IF YOU WANT TO HAVE YOUR SAY NOW AND NOT IN 2 YEARS, WE CAN'T LOOK AFTER OUR OWN LET ALONE ANOTHER 20, 50 OR 100,000 MIGRANTS.
STAND UP AND BE HEARD!
attributes.background:
If David Cameron has his way we will never have an honest  unbiased one! The EU are forcing his hand and he is bowing down before them like a lap dog.
We as a proud country need to show these bullies within the EU that we will not be told what to do and we decide our own fate!!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
